description: Access current weather data for any location on Earth including over 200,000 cities!

targets.query: SELECT mean("wind_speed") FROM "weather" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/ AND "city" =~ /^$city$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sys_country", "name" fill(none)
SELECT mean("main_pressure") FROM "weather" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/ AND "city" =~ /^$city$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "country", "name" fill(none)
SELECT mean("temperature") FROM "weather" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/ AND "city" =~ /^$city$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("wind_speed") FROM "weather" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/ AND "name" =~ /^$city$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "weather" WITH KEY = "country"
list.label: Country
list.name: country
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "weather" WITH KEY = "country"

list.definition: show tag values from "weather" with key = "city";
list.label: City
list.name: city
list.query: show tag values from "weather" with key = "city";
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "weather" WITH KEY = "city" WHERE country= '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "weather" WITH KEY = "country"

title: Weather
